subject: Skiing
Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: The International Ski Federation yesterday barred three Austrian cross-country skiers for two years for their roles in the doping scandal at the 2006 Olympics.Martin Tauber, Johannes Eder and Roland Diethart were suspended and deprived of all their results since Feb. 16, 2006. The Italian police raided the Austrian team lodgings during the Turin Games, seizing a large amount of doping products and equipment.
